bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Comprehensive Physician Ownership and Referral Act of 1993 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to: (1) extend application of the Medicare ban on physician referrals to health care providers with which the physician has a financial relationship to all payors; (2) include additional specified services under the ban; and (3) make changes in exceptions and other provisions under Medicare relating to compensation arrangements.
